title: A Gripping Political Mystery in Northern Ireland
description: Patrick Radden Keefe talks about “Say Nothing,” and Frans de Waal discusses “Mama’s Last Hug: Animal Emotions and What They Tell Us About Ourselves.”
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
